Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
8950 North Oracle Road (the "Property") offers an opportunity to acquire the fee simple interest in a ±41,134 square foot, 100% leased, single tenant,
Class-A office development located within the Palisades Corporate Center in Oro Valley, Arizona (Tucson). Spanning approximately 4.61 acres off the highly-trafficked Oracle Road corridor, this recently renovated, institutional-quality office building is 100% leased to Simpleview, LLC (Simpleview) which serves as the company’s Corporate Headquarters.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: The sale of the Property includes a total of +/-4.61 Acres
Direct vehicular access to the Property is provided directly off Oracle Road
Highly visible location along the primary commercial corridor connecting Tucson to Oro Valley
Zoning: C-1, Town of Oro Valley

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The Property is located at 8950 North Oracle Road on the northeast corner of Hardy Road and Oracle Road in the affluent foothills trade area of Oro Valley, Arizona (Tucson). The Property is situated in a strong employment corridor with excellent access and visibility along Oracle Road, the major north-south commuter thoroughfare in Oro Valley, which features approximately 49,290 vehicles per day (ESRI). Simpleview’s Corporate Headquarters are situated in the Palisades Corporate Center mixed-use development, just north of a freestanding LA Fitness. BASIS Oro Valley (K-12) is located just north of the Property and serves as a major draw to the area. BASIS schools have been ranked consistently among the best schools in the United States, and BASIS Oro Valley was ranked as the third best high school in Arizona. Also, just a few blocks south is the highly rated Pusch Ridge Christian Academy (488 Students/50 Employees) and Canyon Del Oro High School (1,630 Students/148 Employees). Simpleview’s employees have many restaurant and retail amenities to choose from nearby, including: Kneaders Bakery & Café, Growlers USA, Jersey Mike’s, Panera Bread, Starbucks Coffee, CVS, El Charro Café, Panda Express, Eegee’s, McDonald’s and Famous Sam’s Sports Bar, among many others. 

The Arizona Daily Star newspaper called Oro Valley the “upscale tech mecca” of Southern Arizona with over 10 high-tech firms located within the community and a median household income approximately 40% higher than the U.S. median. The average household income is $78,465 within a 1-mile radius of the Property and $102,553 within a 5-mile radius. Major employers in Oro Valley include: Ventana Medical Systems (1,200 employees), Honeywell Aerospace (714 employees), Oro Valley Hospital (672 employees), Town of Oro Valley (478 employees), Hilton El Conquistador Golf & Tennis Resort (337 employees), and Meggitt Securaplane (174 employees) (Source: Arizona Daily Star). 

To serve the growing population of Oro Valley, the city has attracted a wide-range of retailers, businesses, employment centers, and major medical facilities over the last decade. Due to the quality and depth of Oro Valley’s retail offerings, the trade area draws shoppers from the outlying communities of Tucson as well. Major national retailers in the trade area include: The Home Depot, Fry’s Food & Drug Stores (Kroger), Target, Whole Foods, Ross, Trader Joe’s, Marshall’s, Sprouts, HomeGoods, OfficeMax, Planet Fitness, Dollar Tree, PetSmart, Pier 1 Imports, Bank of America and Wells Fargo, among many others.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Property is 100% leased to Simpleview, LLC on a long-term triple net (NNN) lease, providing an investor with a stable and secure cash flow with 3.00% annual built-in rental escalations throughout the primary lease term. Simpleview just moved into the Property in 2018 which serves as the company’s global headquarters. Founded in 2001, Simpleview is the travel and tourism industry’s leading provider of CRM, CMS, website design, digital marketing, revenue generation, and mobile technologies for destination marketing organizations. Simpleview works with over 540 travel and tourism clients across 6 continents and appeared on America’s fastest growing private companies Inc. 5000 list for eleven consecutive years (2007-2017). Simpleview has more than 10 years remaining on their original lease term, offering an investor a rare NNN corporate headquarter income stream from one of Arizona’s fastest-growing companies. The cash flow produced by the Property provides an investor with long-term stability and income growth, while the full expense reimbursement from the tenant reduces expense exposure, resulting in a predictable income stream in a Class-A corporate headquarter location.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Long-Term Corporate Headquarter for Sale in Tucson
